Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Inotuzumab ozogamicin is approved to treat adults and children aged 1 year and older with:

ItemizedList.ListItem: B-cell acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL) that is CD22 positive and has come back or did not respond to treatment.

Section.Para: Inotuzumab ozogamicin is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
